skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a front-end developer, you typically work with a combination of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the user-facing part of websites and web applications. Here's an overview of the frameworks and libraries use

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a back-end developer, you are responsible for the server-side logic of web applications, managing databases, and ensuring the application's performance, security, and responsiveness. Here are some of the key technologies and tools commonly used in back-end development

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience) design are critical aspects of creating engaging, user-friendly web and mobile applications. Here's an overview of tools and methodologies commonly used in UI and UX design

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow is a popular web design and development tool that enables designers to build responsive websites visually without needing extensive coding skills. It combines the capabilities of a design tool and a CMS (Content Management System), providing a powerful platform for creating and managing websites

portfolio.title: Guess Number Game App
portfolio.description: I am excited to present my Guess the Number game, which can be accessed at Guess the Number. This project is a simple yet engaging number guessing game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It demonstrates my ability to create interactive web applications, handle user input, and implement game logic effectively. The game includes features such as score tracking and highscore maintenance, showcasing my skills in front-end development and dynamic UI updates.

portfolio.title: Ludo Game App
portfolio.description: I am pleased to share my Ludo Game project, available at Ludo Game. This project is an implementation of the classic board game Ludo using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It showcases my ability to develop interactive web applications, manage game state, and provide a seamless user experience. The game includes features like rolling dice, player turns, and winning conditions, demonstrating my proficiency in front-end development and JavaScript logic.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: I am excited to share my Weather App project, hosted on GitHub at Weather App GitHub. This project showcases my skills in web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app fetches real-time weather data from an API, providing users with current weather conditions and forecasts for any location. It demonstrates my ability to integrate APIs, handle asynchronous data, and create user-friendly interfaces.

portfolio.title: Netflix App
portfolio.description: I am excited to present my project, the Netflix React App, a dynamic and interactive web application built using React.js, designed to replicate the Netflix user interface and experience. The application features a clean and responsive design, user authentication, and real-time data fetching from a movie API to display the latest trending movies and TV shows.

portfolio.title: IMDB CLONE App ANGULAR
portfolio.description: The Blue Movie Angular website is an Angular-based application that provides information about movies. It features a modern, user-friendly interface that includes a home page with popular or trending movies, individual movie detail pages with comprehensive information, and a search functionality to find specific movies. The site likely integrates with a movie database API to dynamically fetch and display data.

portfolio.title: IMDB CLONE App REACT
portfolio.description: The website Blue Movie React appears to be a movie information site built with ReactJS. It likely features components such as a home page displaying popular or recent movies, individual movie detail pages, and a search function. The site utilizes a modern, responsive design and likely integrates with a movie database API to fetch and display movie data dynamically. For a detailed look, you can visit the site directly.
